resources.string: How do I use my received invitation?

"Access rights are issued based on the invitation, so congratulation on receiving the Cosy invitation. 

To join, click the link in the invitation that you have received to access the inviter’s personal page. Touch the “Join” button on that page. Next, you need to confirm your email address and username, and enter your new password. 

Once you have created your account, please download the app to your mobile, tablet, or desktop computer. 

Still need help 

 Do not hesitate to contact us .support @ Cosy.comCosy. "
